title: Brexit crunch week: What will happen in Westminster and Europe?
text:
It is Brexit crunch week. In Brussels and in Westminster, officials are working around the clock to find a pathway to a deal. But a deal is not the end of the road - it has to pass through Parliament and the clock is ticking ahead of Oct 31.

With so many possible twists and turns, here's how the week will play out.

Monday Oct 14

Franco-German pow-wow: On Sunday the German Chancellor, Angela Merkel, and French President, Emmanuel Macron, met at the Elysee Palace to prepare for upcoming summits where Brexit will top the agenda. If the EU is to make a breakthrough concession on the terms of Britain’s exit from the bloc, it will require the blessing of the bloc’s two most influential members....
